channel.title: Feature Request: Make tb-downloader/updater (anondist) use installed Tor
channel.description: When user install tb-downloader then link to it or call Tor package as well from whonix/kicksecure repo, Similar to apt-trasnport-tor it will call Tor package if not installed, then let tb-downloader download TB over Tor.

item.title: Feature Request: Make tb-downloader/updater (anondist) use installed Tor
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
When user install tb-downloader then link to it or call Tor package as well from whonix/kicksecure repo, Similar to apt-trasnport-tor it will call Tor package if not installed, then let tb-downloader download TB over Tor.

Read full topic
item.source: Feature Request: Make tb-downloader/updater (anondist) use installed Tor
